labels.name: feature
labels.value: This feature file includes all test cases related to Update Password Page of Orangehrm

labels.name: story
labels.value: To verify when user enters Confirm password as blank then it should display error as 'Passwords do not match'

labels.value: This feature file includes all test cases related to Update Password Page of Orangehrm

steps.name: When User login & click DropDown for Confirm Password as blank
And Enter current Password,New Password,confirm Password as blank and click on Save
Then It should display error msg for blank confirm password as 'Passwords do not match'.
